sqlMap.select: SELECT postId, scrappedBlogId as "scrappedBlog.id", scrappedPostId, scrappedPostTitle, scrappedPostContents FROM scraps where postId = #postId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into scraps (postId, scrappedBlogId, scrappedPostId, scrappedPostTitle, scrappedPostContents) values(#postId#, #scrappedBlog.id#, #scrappedPostId#, #scrappedPostTitle#, #scrappedPostContents#)
